text: "Sara" is a 1979 song by British American rock band Fleetwood Mac. It was taken from their 12th studio album Tusk. It went to number 7 in the United States, number 11 in Australia, number 12 in Canada and New Zealand, number 14 in Belgium and the Netherlands, number 18 in South Africa, number 31 in France, number 37 in the United Kingdom and number 44 in Germany. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs
title: Sara (Fleetwood Mac song)
